full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHAS MANG BLO GSAL KUN DGA' CHOS GLING SGOS KYI THUN MONGS MA YIN PA'I GTOR 'BUL SOGS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(CES PA 'DI ^SKYABS MGON RDO RJE 'CHANG RJE BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO DPAL BZANG POS GRVA TSANG 'DI DANG PO BTZUGS GNAS SKABS GSUNG BA YIN ZHING, DE LA TSIG RKNA GCIG CHAD SONG BA LTA BU 'DUG PA LA RJES MA ME MO BYA LON GRVA TSANG 'DON CHA GSAR SGRIGS SKABS, BSHAD DANG SGRUB PA'I RNAM DKAR 'PHEL ZHING BKA' DRIN MTSUNGS MED, ^YONGS 'DZIN NO MON HAN MANDYDZU GHO shA'I MTSAN GYIS BSNAN PAR MDZAD PA'I YIN LAGS,, ,,)
author_simple: YONGS 'DZIN NO MON HAN MANDYDZU GHO shA'I MTSAN,
